description.p: You can cast create food and water once without expending a spell slot. When you do so, you can choose for the food to be cursed. A creature that consumes cursed food from the spell must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be cursed and charmed by you for 1 hour.
You regain the ability to do cast the spell in this way when you finish a long rest.
